languages.text: "Впрочем... Эта правительница точно знает, что вы вернете Говорящего-с-Богами домой и упокоите лес Кетца Темера. Предсказания жрецов еще никогда не лгали сему племени, а потому эта правительница просит вас ни о чем не беспокоиться и отдохнуть здесь, в сердце леса".

traits.locale_text: "Впрочем... Эта правительница точно знает, что вы вернете Говорящего-с-Богами домой и упокоите лес Кетца Темера. Предсказания жрецов еще никогда не лгали сему племени, а потому эта правительница просит вас ни о чем не беспокоиться и отдохнуть здесь, в сердце леса".

languages.text: "Nevertheless... This ruler knows that you will bring Speaks-With-Gods home and soothe the forest of Quetza Temer. The prophecies of the priests have never betrayed our tribe before, and thus this ruler asks you to forget about your worries and rest here, in the heart of the forest."
languages.original_text: "Впрочем... Эта правительница точно знает, что вы вернете Говорящего-с-Богами домой и упокоите лес Кетца Темера. Предсказания жрецов еще никогда не лгали сему племени, а потому эта правительница просит вас ни о чем не беспокоиться и отдохнуть здесь, в сердце леса".

traits.locale_text: "But then... This ruler knows for sure that you will bring Speaks-With-Gods home and pacify the forest of Quetza Temer. The prophecies of the priests had never betrayed our tribe before, and thus this ruler asks you to rest here, in the heart of forest, and not to worry about anything."

"But then... This ruler knows for sure that you will bring Speaks-With-Gods home and pacify the forest of Quetza Temer. The prophecies of the priests had never betrayed our tribe before, and thus this ruler asks you to rest here, in the heart of forest, and not to worry about anything."

"But then... This ruler knows for sure that you will bring Speaks-With-Gods home and pacify the forest of Quetza Temer. The prophecies of the priests had never betrayed our tribe before, and thus this ruler asks you to rest here, in the heart of the forest, and not to worry about anything."

"But then... This ruler knows for sure that you will bring Speaks-With-Gods home and pacify the forest of Quetza Temer. The prophecies of the priests had never betrayed our tribe before, and thus this ruler asks you to rest here, in the heart of the forest, and not to worry about anything."

"Nevertheless... This ruler knows that you will bring Speaks-With-Gods home and soothe the forest of Quetza Temer. The prophecies of the priests have never betrayed our tribe before, and thus this ruler asks you to forget about your worries and rest here, in the heart of the forest."

"Nevertheless... This ruler knows that you will bring Speaks-With-Gods home and soothe the forest of Quetza Temer. The prophecies of the priests have never betrayed our tribe before, and thus this ruler asks you to forget about your worries and rest here, in the heart of the forest."

languages.text: «Sin embargo... Esta jefa sabe que traerás a Habla-con-Dioses a casa y amansarás al bosque de Quetza Temer. Las profecías de los sacerdotes nunca han fallado a nuestra tribu, y por eso esta jefa te pide que olvides todas tus preocupaciones y reposes aquí, en el corazón del bosque».
languages.original_text: "Nevertheless... This ruler knows that you will bring Speaks-With-Gods home and soothe the forest of Quetza Temer. The prophecies of the priests have never betrayed our tribe before, and thus this ruler asks you to forget about your worries and rest here, in the heart of the forest."

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo... Esta jefa está convencida de que traerás a Habla-con-Dioses a casa y apaciguarás el bosque de Quetza Temer. Las profecías de los sacerdotes nunca han fallado a nuestra tribu, y por eso esta jefa te pide que reposes aquí, en el corazón del bosque, y olvides todas tus preocupaciones».

languages.text: “即便如此……此酋长也明白您会把‘神谕’带回部落，安抚格扎尔特默的森林。祭司们的预言从来没有落空过，因此，此酋长希望您能在这里休息，就在这森林的中心，无须烦恼任何事情。”
languages.original_text: "Nevertheless... This ruler knows that you will bring Speaks-With-Gods home and soothe the forest of Quetza Temer. The prophecies of the priests have never betrayed our tribe before, and thus this ruler asks you to forget about your worries and rest here, in the heart of the forest."

traits.locale_text: “但是……此酋长相信您会把‘神谕’带回部落，安抚格扎尔特默的森林。祭司们的预言从来没有辜负过我们部落，因此，此酋长希望您能在这里休息，就在这森林的中心。您无须担心任何事情。”

languages.text: « Cela étant... cette dirigeante sait que vous ramènerez Parle-aux-Dieux ici et que vous apaiserez la forêt de Quetza Temer. Les prophéties des prêtres n'ont encore jamais trahi notre tribu, c'est pourquoi cette dirigeante vous demande de vous reposer ici, au cœur de la forêt, et de ne vous inquiéter de rien. »
languages.original_text: "Nevertheless... This ruler knows that you will bring Speaks-With-Gods home and soothe the forest of Quetza Temer. The prophecies of the priests have never betrayed our tribe before, and thus this ruler asks you to forget about your worries and rest here, in the heart of the forest."

traits.locale_text: « Cela étant... cette dirigeante sait que vous ramènerez Parle-aux-Dieux ici et que vous apaiserez la forêt de Quetza Temer. Les prophéties des prêtres n'ont encore jamais trahi notre tribu, c'est pourquoi cette dirigeante vous demande de vous reposer ici, au cœur de la forêt, et de ne vous inquiéter de rien. »

languages.text: 「それでも…この支配者は、あなたが『神々との語り部』を連れ帰り、ケツァ・テメルの森を癒やす者であろうと確信しておりますれば。司祭たちの予言は、これまで一度も我々の部族を裏切ったことはありません。ゆえに、この支配者は、森の中心であるこの場所で不安を忘れ、休むようにと頼むのです」
languages.original_text: "Nevertheless... This ruler knows that you will bring Speaks-With-Gods home and soothe the forest of Quetza Temer. The prophecies of the priests have never betrayed our tribe before, and thus this ruler asks you to forget about your worries and rest here, in the heart of the forest."

traits.locale_text: 「それでも…この支配者は、あなたが『神々との語り部』を連れ帰り、ケツァ・テメルの森を癒やす者であろうと確信しておりますれば。司祭たちの予言は、これまで一度も我々の部族を裏切ったことはありません。ゆえに、この支配者は、森の中心であるこの場所で不安を忘れ、休むようにと頼むのです」

languages.text: "Dennoch ... Diese Herrscherin weiß, dass Ihr Spricht-mit-den-Göttern nach Hause bringen und die Wälder von Quetza Temer besänftigen werdet. Die Prophezeiungen der Priester haben unseren Stamm noch nie verraten, und daher bittet diese Herrscherin Euch, Eure Sorgen zu vergessen und hier, im Herzen des Waldes, zu rasten."
languages.original_text: "Nevertheless... This ruler knows that you will bring Speaks-With-Gods home and soothe the forest of Quetza Temer. The prophecies of the priests have never betrayed our tribe before, and thus this ruler asks you to forget about your worries and rest here, in the heart of the forest."

traits.locale_text: "Andererseits ... Diese Herrscherin weiß mit Gewissheit, dass Ihr Spricht-mit-den-Göttern nach Hause bringen und die Wälder von Quetza Temer befrieden werdet. Die Prophezeiungen der Priester haben unseren Stamm noch nie verraten, und daher bittet diese Herrscherin Euch, hier zu rasten, im Herzen des Waldes, und Euch nicht zu sorgen."

languages.text: "Gelgelelim... Bu hükümdar, Tanrıların Dili'ni yuvasına geri getirerek Quetza Temer ormanını yatıştıracağınızı biliyor. Rahiplerin kehanetleri, daha evvel kabilemize hiç ihanet etmemiştir. Bundandır ki bu hükümdar; endişelerinizi bir kenara bırakarak burada, ormanın kalbinde dinlenmenizi istiyor."
languages.original_text: "Nevertheless... This ruler knows that you will bring Speaks-With-Gods home and soothe the forest of Quetza Temer. The prophecies of the priests have never betrayed our tribe before, and thus this ruler asks you to forget about your worries and rest here, in the heart of the forest."
